div.ab: zōt ud rāspīg: Anklesaria, Kotwal and Boyd, Geldner. Vid. also VrS29.1.

Quotations.ab: pad aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā hāwan abāg wardēnišn.
At aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā he has to turn the mortar right side.

ab.ab: "In st. 1 the zōt strikes the rim of the inverted mortar against the table three times, while saying "We worship the Bountiful Immortals, food rulers, food bestowers" (amēshā spēṇtā hukhshathrā hudhāonghō yazamaidē), and then sets the mortar upright on the table".
